Articles.Content:
Where has it gone? I cannot seem to locate it, or anything like it. I see the FL-10 adapter but that's like replacing a porsche with a pinto!

You've ruined the game, Squad. Ruined it.

Edit: Errr.. so I found it. Hidden in fuel tanks. The universe is right again.

This can be deleted, or left for shaming.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T02:47:28Z" title="05/07/2015 02:47  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by Randazzo**

> 
> ...This can be deleted, or left for shaming.

Or just, you know, "I had this difficulty AND found the solution, maybe it will help someone else too".

Don't knock yourself, there's nothing wrong with your post :-)

> 
> Don't knock yourself, there's nothing wrong with your post :-)

maybe this : 

> 
> You've ruined the game, Squad. Ruined it.

 ?

> 
> maybe this : 
>  ?

That part was a joke, which should be abundantly clear.
